utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey, you guys, look! Ugly Naked Guy is putting stuff in boxes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'd say from the looks of it; our naked buddy is moving.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ironically, most of the boxes seem to be labeled clothes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, I'm gonna miss that big old squishy butt.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And we're done with the chicken fried rice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! If he's moving, maybe I should try to get his place!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Good idea! Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It would be so cool to live across from you guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, yeah! Then we could do that telephone thing! Y'know, you have a can, we have a can and it's connected by a string!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Or we can do the actual telephone thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! I love this apartment! Isn't it perfect?! I can't believe I never realized how great it is!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well that is because your eye immediately goes to the big naked man.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's amazing! You better hurry up and fill out an application or I'm gonna beat you to it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I never thought I'd say this, but I'm gonna go use Ugly Naked Guy's bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: CHANDLER AND MONICA!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH MY GOD!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It's okay!! It's okay!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: NO! THEY'RE DOING IT!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YOU KNOW?!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn't know so you have to stop screaming!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: HI!! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing! Oh God, we're just so excited that you want to get this apartment!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, it looks really good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get in here!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You mean whenever Monica and Chandler where like y'know doing laundry or going grocery shopping or—Oh! All that time Monica spent on the phone with sad Linda from camp!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh, doing it. Doing it. Phone doing it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Oh, I can't believe it! I mean I think it's great! For him. She might be able to do better.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! Come here! Come here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe just found out about Monica and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You mean how they're friends and nothing more?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Joey, she knows! We were at Ugly Naked Guy's apartment and we saw them doing it through the window. Actually, we saw them doing it up against the window.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, so now they know that you know and they don't know that Rachel knows?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes, but y'know what? It doesn't matter who knows what. Now, enough of us know that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would finally be over!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our own.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh-what do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well y'know every time that they say that like they're doing laundry we'll just give them a bunch of laundry to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh, I-I would enjoy that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no! No-no wait Rach, you know what would even be more fun? Telling them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ehhh, no, I wanna do Phoebe's thing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't take any…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! You don't have to do anything! Just don't tell them that we know!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Noo! I can't take any more secrets! I've got your secrets. I've got their secrets. I got secrets of my own y'know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don't have any secrets!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well, you don't know about Hugsy, my bedtime penguin pal.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So umm, how-how are we gonna mess with them?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ugh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you could use your position y'know as the roommate.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And then. I would use y'know the strongest tool at my disposal. My sexuality.

utterance.content: Hello children!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, watch, learn, and don't eat my cookie.

utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.content: Yeah the material feels so soft—hello Mr. Bicep! Have you been working out?

utterance.content: Well, I try to y'know, squeeze things. Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, if you really wanna know, I'm—Oh! I can't tell you this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe, it's me. You can tell me anything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well actually you're the one person I can't tell this too. And the one person I want to the most.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I think it's just y'know that I haven't been with a guy in so long and how sometimes you're looking for something and you just don’t even see that it's right there in front of you sipping coffee—Oh no, have I said to much? Well it's just something to think about. I know I will.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are so cute! How did you get to be so cute?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, my Grandfather was Swedish and my Grandmother was actually a tiny little bunny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, now you're even cuter!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know that is a popular opinion today I must say.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The weirdest thing happened at the coffee house, I think, I think Phoebe was hitting on me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm telling you I think Phoebe thinks I'm foxy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's not possible!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry it's just, Phoebe just always thought you were, you were charming in a, in a sexless kind of way.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, y'know I-I can't hear that enough.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I think that you just misunderstood her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I didn't misunderstand, okay? She was all over me! She touched my bicep for crying out loud!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This bicep?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well it's not flexed right now!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Mon, what are you doing now? Wanna come see a movie with us?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uhh, y'know actually I was gonna do some laundry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Chandler, wanna do it with me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, I'll do it with ya.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay great, hold on a sec! Oh, here you go! You don't mind do ya? That would really help me out a lot! Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean I-I don't I think I have enough quarters.

utterance.content: I have quarters!

utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Ross! Any word on the apartment yet?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I called over there and it turns out Ugly Naked Guy is subletting it himself and he's already had like a hundred applicants.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.content: No-no, I got the edge. I know it's not exactly ethical but I sent him a little bribe to

utterance.content: No.

utterance.content: That new mountain bike?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.content: Well what did you send?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A basket of mini-muffins.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But there's a whole table of mini-muffin baskets. Which one did you send?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The small one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! You-you actually thought that basket was gonna get you the apartment?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well yeah! Someone sent us a basket at work once and people went crazy over those little muffins. It was the best day.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Your work makes me sad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh man! I want that place so much!! I was so sure that was gonna work! There's twelve bucks I'll never see again!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right honey, we'd better go if we wanna catch that movie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.content: Bye Chandler! I miss you already.

utterance.content: Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate and the pinching!!

utterance.content: Actually, I did!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so now do you believe that she's attracted to me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe knows and she's just trying to freak us out! That's the only explanation for it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay but what about y'know my pinchable butt and my bulging biceps—She knows!

utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe knows about us!

utterance.content: Well I didn't tell them!

utterance.content: Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.

utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.content: And Rachel. I would've told you but they made me promise not to tell!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh man!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sorry! But hey, it's over now, right? Because you can tell them that you know they know and I can go back to knowing absolutely nothing!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Unless…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Not unless! Look this must end now!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But see they don't know that we know that they know! So…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Noooo.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross, honey you gotta stop torturing yourself!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, why don't you just find another apartment?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look I've already looked at like a thousand apartments this month and none of them even compares to that one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know what you should do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You should find out what his hobbies are and then use that to bond with him. Yeah! Like if I would strike up a conversation about say umm, sandwiches. Or uh, or my underwear.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm listening.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That is a great idea! And! I know Ugly Naked Guy because we've been watching him for like five years so that gives me back my edge! Oh, let's see now he had the trampoline.

utterance.content: He broke that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, he had gravity boots.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, he broke those too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So he likes to break stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I've got to go pick up Ben but I-I will figure something out. Hey, didn't he used to have a cat?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wouldn't bring that up, it would probably just bum him out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, poor cat, never saw that big butt coming.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello! Oh yeah! Hey! Hold on a second she's right here! It's Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh? Hello you.

utterance.content: Hello Phoebe, I've been thinking about you all day.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Eh?

utterance.content: Well you know that thing you said before, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't intrigued.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, listen, Joey isn't gonna be here tonight so why don't you come over and I'll let you uh, feel my bicep. Or maybe more.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! Oh my God! He wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you kidding?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!

utterance.content: I can not believe he would do that to Mon—Whoa! Joey, do they know that we know?

utterance.content: No.

utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They know you know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God, they thought they can mess with us! They're trying to mess with us?! They don't know that we know they know we know! Joey, you can't say anything!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I couldn't even if I wanted too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good evening, sir. My name is Ross Geller. I'm one of the people who applied for the apartment. And I-I realize that the competition is fierce but—I'm sorry. I, I can't help but notice you're naked and I applaud you. Man, I wish I was naked. I mean, this-this looks so great. That is how God intended it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at them, they're-they're panicked!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, they're totally gonna back down!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. All right! If he wants a date? He's gonna get a date. All right, I'm gonna go in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. Be sexy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please.

utterance.content: So Chandler, I-I'd love to come by tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh absolutely. Shall we say, around seven?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good. I'm really looking forward to you and me having sexual intercourse.

utterance.content: Hey-hey, check it out! Check it out! Ugly Naked Guy has a naked friend!

utterance.content: Oh yeah! Oh my God! That is our friend! It's Naked Ross!

utterance.content: Show time!

utterance.content: Okay, Rachel, get me perfume!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.content: All right, it'll be great! You just make her think you wanna have sex with her! It'll totally freak her out!

utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.content: Good idea!

utterance.content: Yeah, oh wait!

utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.content: Come on in.

utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.content: No, I want this to happen.

utterance.content: So do I.

utterance.content: I'm gonna put on some music.

utterance.content: Maybe, maybe I'll dance for you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look good.

utterance.content: Thanks! Y'know, that when you say things like that it makes me wanna rip that sweater vest right off!

utterance.content: Well, why don't we move this into the bedroom?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. No! It's just y'know first, I wanna take off all my clothes and have you rub lotion on me.

utterance.content: Well that would be nice. I'll go get the lotion.

utterance.content: Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put lotion on her!

utterance.content: Oh man! Aren't you guys done yet?! I wanna sit in my chair!

utterance.content: Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler the sooner this is all over and out in the open.

utterance.content: Ooh!

utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.content: I like that! Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He's afraid of bras! Can't work 'em!

utterance.content: Oh, you're-you're going?

utterance.content: Love her! That's right, I…LOVE…HER!!! I love her!! I love you, Monica.

utterance.content: I love you too Chandler.
